name: Torch Of Tez Calling The Monster
description:
the story of a cave inhabited by a monster who befriends a young wizard who has the torch of tez. only that torch can make the monster tame, they end up having a strong friendship, even the villagers don't know about it, because of rumors spread in the village that the cave is inhabited by wild and evil monsters.
One day there was a big storm in the village, all the houses were destroyed and many residents were injured. when the storm was about to hit the village, the little boy summoned the monster with his torch, as a result the monster came out of the cave for the first time, and immediately saved the boy and the few remaining residents. The storm was restrained by his large body and instantly the storm disappeared, since then the villagers are no longer afraid even now they like to meet in the cave to just thank and feed the monster.
